import plotly.plotly as py from plotly.graph_objs import * # Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api data = py.get_figure("https://plot.ly/~AlexHP/68").get_data() distance = [d['y'][0] for d in data] # check out the data for yourself! fig = Figure() fig['data'] += [Histogram(y=distance, name="flyby distance", histnorm='probability')] xaxis = XAxis(title="Probability for Flyby at this Distance") yaxis = YAxis(title="Distance from Earth (Earth Radii)") fig['layout'].update(title="data source: https://plot.ly/~AlexHP/68", xaxis=xaxis, yaxis=yaxis) plot_url = py.plot(fig, filename="python-get-data")
